basics.name: Nick Reilly
basics.label: PhD Candidate - Physics and Astronomy
basics.summary: PhD candidate with extensive experience in physics and astronomy, specialized in infrared detectors for space astrophysics. Skilled in laboratory research, equipment maintenance, and data analysis.

work.summary: Research on infrared detectors for space astrophysics, including development of analysis pipelines, equipment installation, and maintenance.
highlights: Developed analysis pipeline for NEO Surveyor calibration.
Installed and maintained advanced detector systems in cryogenic conditions.

work.summary: Focused on biophysical research related to cell motility and viral infection impacts on cell dynamics.
highlights: Developed specific assays for CD4+ T Cells.

work.summary: Primary support for safety and heavy metal analysis, operating various testing equipment and enhancing SOPs.
highlights: Enhanced testing procedures and automated basic tests.
